import { useEffect,useState } from "react" import { Container ,Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import { ArrowRightCircle } from "react-bootstrap-icons" import headerImg from "../assets/img/header-img.svg" export const Banner = () => { const [loopNum, setLoopNum] = use const toRotate = ["web Developer", "web Designer", "UI/UX Designer"] return (
Welcome to my Portfolio

{`Hi I'm Bipin`}web developer

Hey there , this is Bipin a full-stack web developer

) }
